## RemirrorManager class

This component consumes any directly nested RemirrorExtension components and creates a manager instance which is passed into the created context for any children to consume.

It allows for a more React-ish way of managing Prosemirror.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class RemirrorManager extends Component<RemirrorManagerProps> 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [defaultProps](./react.remirrormanager.defaultprops.md) | <code>static</code> | <code>{</code><br/><code>        useBaseExtensions: true;</code><br/><code>    }</code> |  |
|  [manager](./react.remirrormanager.manager.md) |  | <code>ExtensionManager</code> | Calculate the manager based on the baseExtension and passed in props. |
